endpoints.description: Submit customer feedback to the service for analysis.
Retrieve details for a specific feedback submission using its unique identifier.
Fetch a summary of customer sentiment analysis reports.
Submit specific parameters to customize the analysis process.
Retrieve key concerns identified from the aggregated feedback data.
Access trends and patterns evident from the customer feedback analysis.
Update an existing feedback entry identified by its unique identifier.
Remove a feedback entry from the service utilizing its unique identifier.
Obtain a generated report of all analysis and insights in downloadable formats.
Search through feedback using query parameters such as date range, sentiment, or keywords.
